Description: Found song data to use in fine-tuning the LLM.
Researched current best approaches to fine-tune an LLM with limited resources. Decided to use Q-LoRA.
Conducted experiments on the data to better understand what I was working with.
Prepared the data for use in finetuning.
Prepared and setup a new environment for the finetuning the LLM. Ran into several issues with versioning that had to be resolved.
Built out finetuning scripts and tested it on a small sample of data.
Attempted to start training at scale. Had issues that needed to be debugged. Also added more checkpoints to allow for recovery from crashing
Monitored the first iteration of training at scale. Got to a checkpoint at 5% before crashing.
Process failed overnight. Restarted training and monitored for a while.
Process failed overnight. Restarted training and monitored for a while.
Set up and conducted some tests to see if there were improvements.
